projects.title: The Gym Planning App
projects.description:
This application allows the user plan future workouts. The workout planning application provides the following functionality:
1. Login using YouTube account
2. Add exercises including title, image links, video links, and description.
3. Allows the user to select a calendar date and exercises, including reps, sets and max-weight for that date.
4. Provide a list of upcoming planned workout instances.
5. Provides functionality to flag each planned exercise as completed. 
6. Display the number of completed workouts on the dashboard for that user.
